protocols
=========

Here you can find a set of lab analysis protocols.

* [Analyzing RNA-seq data with the "Tuxedo" tools](tophat_cufflinks/)
* [Routinely testing your R package with Travis](travis_bioc_devel/)



If you are a member at Leek group and want to contribute a template, please check [](). Basically, fork the repository, copy [protocol template](protocol_template/) to a new directory, modify it to your liking, update this page, and submit a pull request.
